actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-145.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-230.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 20,000 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit: Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-145) Directs that there be printed as a House document the report of the House Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs of the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit: Guide to Consumer Credit Laws." Directs that an additional 20,000 copies of the report be printed for use by the subcommittee.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution providing for the printing of 20,000 additional copies of the subcommittee print of the Subcommittee on Consumer Affairs and the Committee on Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs entitled "Give Yourself Credit: Guide to Consumer Credit Laws."
